resources.string: Jigme Dorji Wangchuck National Referral Hospital, Thimphu.

The JDWNRH is the main hospital in Bhutan, located in the capital of Bhutan, Thimphu. It was established in 1972, and provides free basic medical treatment as well as advanced surgeries and emergency services to citizens from all over the country. It provides the most sophisticated health evaluation and management services in the country.

This Android App Find A Doctor is to check the availability of doctors in the hospital especially in the JDWNRH. This App provides platform to avail the services facilitated by doctors and their availability in the hospital if users have installed this app.
This button helps user to search the app entering doctors specialization or by name.
Doctors need to enter their credentials to update their status.
This feature provides information and alert the users about the latest outbreak of dieases and updates the important messages.
This feature contain list of options such as Login,Help,Share app,About us,Feedback and Rate us
This feature provides user manual for the app users to giude them when they encounter the problems..
This section of setting is to suggest the users to share app to social media if it is found very useful and productive.
This section of the setting is to make users know more about the app and their functionlity.
This feature provides the platform for users to comments and give feedback for the betterment of the App.
This section is to rate the App according to the services facilated by the app to the users.
This provides an Admin and doctors to enter their credentials to update their status.
